content: Select System View -> Volume Management. Click Add -> Volume Group. Use vg_srv as Volume Group Name. Add the device to the volume group. Click Finish. Select System View -> Volume Management. Click Add -> Logical Volume. Set the name of the Logical Volume to srv, click Next. Use Maximum Size and click Next. Select Format partition and use file system XFS. Select Mount partition and set the Mount Point to /srv. Click finish and Next. Click Finish and leave YaST with Quit. 404 Virtualization Cookbook: Vol 1: IBM z/VM 7.2 e.
